title: Aquatic Plants Quiz
description: Dive into the world of water-loving plants! From lily pads to cattails, how well do you know aquatic flora?

questions.question: Which aquatic plant has enormous floating leaves that can support the weight of a small child?
What is the difference between a water lily and a lotus flower?
options: Lotus leaves and flowers rise above the water; water lily pads float on it
Lotus only grows in salt water
